price: "У сизларни ерингиздан чиқармоқчи бўляпти. Энди шунга нима дейсизлар?»
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
